rows.name:
If you have two Blades, make sure to switch
between them. It'll give you a lot more
options in battle!

Have you ever seen a unique monster?
Apparently, each one has its own
fearsome title.

I have. They're rumored to be crazy strong,
so I ran for my life!
See anything?

Monsters don't come near the camp,
so we should be safe here.

We're here in pursuit of the Holy Grail.
Be ready for combat at all times.
Aye-aye, sir!

Our orders are to stand by here in Gula.
We could be deployed at any moment,
so stay prepared.
Sir, yes, sir!

We'll prepare to set sail
at a moment's notice.

Another dead end!
How are we supposed to find the exact
location of the Holy Grail?!

We can't just move this Divine Beast warship
around recklessly. I think our only option is
to wait for orders from the homeland.
We should head for Iira at once!

Even if you say that, we have no orders.
They might think it's an act of aggression,
an invasion taking advantage of the chaos.

We're finally departing for Iira.
It's time to show them the might of the Superbian army!

We're still preparing for departure.
Please calm yourself, sir, or your blood pressure...

Capture the remnants of Coeia if you can.
And recover their equipment...

Understood, but few of them are surrendering.
It's proving to be a struggle.

Lord Hugo!
Thank goodness you're safe.

When we heard that the Iiran capital, Aurium,
was attacked by the Holy Grail,
we feared the worst.

Hugo-sama.
We're about to set sail with this
Divine Beast battleship for Iira.

The battle against the Holy Grail will be fierce...
We swear that we will prove useful to you.
